StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: NUMBER_OF_TKRARR
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE OSD.NUMBER_OF_TKRARR IS
sub osd.comm_master.subject%type;
y osd.comm_master.year%type;
c_date osd.comm_master.create_date%type;
cursor c is select count(*) num,process_no,dept_code
from osd.comm_all
where TO_CHAR(in_DATE_YY)||'/'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(in_DATE_MM),2,'0')||'/'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(in_DATE_DD),2,'0') between '1435/01/01' and '1435/12/30'
group by process_no,dept_code ;
begin
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('TRUNCATE TABLE osd.NUMBER_OF_TEKRAR');
for c1 in c loop
insert into osd.NUMBER_OF_TEKRAR
values (c1.num , c1.process_no , c1.dept_code , null,null,null,null,null,null);
end loop;
commit;
end;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:

c_date osd.comm_master.create_date%type;

where TO_CHAR(in_DATE_YY)||'/'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(in_DATE_MM),2,'0')||'/'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(in_DATE_DD),2,'0') between '1435/01/01' and '1435/12/30'
group by process_no,dept_code ;
begin
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('TRUNCATE TABLE osd.NUMBER_OF_TEKRAR');
for c1 in c loop
insert into osd.NUMBER_OF_TEKRAR
values (c1.num , c1.process_no , c1.dept_code , null,null,null,null,null,null);
end loop;
commit;
end;
